Some people say: Some winners are willing to be a tiger like a tiger, like an eagle, and he feels happy; if he is like a sheep, like a chicken, he feels boredom of victory.Some winners, when they overcome everything, saw the death of death and fell.In addition, desolate, loneliness, instead feel the sadness of victory. However, our Aqi is not so scarce. He is always proud: this may also be a evidence that Chinese spiritual civilization is crowned all over the world.
Seeing, he seemed to be flying!

However, this victory made him a little strange.He fluttered for a long time, drifting into the Tulu Temple, as usual, he should lie down and snore.Who knows that this night, he is not easy to close. He feels that his thumb and second finger are a little weird: as if they are more slippery than usual.I don't know if there is a little slippery thing on his face to stick to his fingers, or is his finger grinding on his face?Nympho
"Broken son's grandson!"

This sentence was heard again in Aqi's ear.He thought: Yes, there should be a woman, and no one for the broken son for a bowl of rice ... There should be a woman.Husband "There is three none of the silks" ⑦, and "Ruo Ao's ghosts" are also a sorrow of life, so his thoughts are actually in the Bible virtue, but unfortunately some later some later some"Can't be assured".
"Woman, woman! ..." He thought.
"... the monk moved ... woman, woman! ... woman!" He thought again.
We can't know when Aq is snoring this night.But he always felt that his fingers were somewhat slippery, so he always fluttered; "female ..." He thought.
That is, we can know that women are harmful.

Most Chinese men could have been sages, but unfortunately they were destroyed by women.Shang was dying; Zhou was damaged by Zhou; Qin ... Although Shi Wumingwen, we also assume that he may not be wrong because of a woman, and Dong Zhuo did kill Diao Chan.

Aya was originally a positive person. Although we did not know what he had taught by Master, he had always been very strict for the "big defense of men and women"; it was also very exclusive -such as the little nun and the fake foreign ghosts.—— qi.His doctrine is: Aunt Vanni must be private with a monk; a woman walks outside and must want to seduce wild men; a man and a woman speak there, and must be fooled.To punish them, he often watched, or said a few words of "heart -hearted", or in the cold place, he threw a small stone from behind.

Who knew that he would be in the "Embarra" year, but he was furious by his aunt.This fluttering spirit should not be there in etiquette and religion -so women are really abominable. If the little nun's face is not slippery, Ah will not be stunned, and if the little nun's face is covered,Aqi will not be stunned. —— five or six years ago, he twisted a woman's thigh in the crowd of the play, but because of a layer of pants, it was not fluttering since then -and the small little -small -small small, and the small little time.Nuns are not, this shows that heresy is abominable.
"Female ..." Ah thought.

He often pays attention to the woman who thinks "who wants to seduce wild men", but Yi does not laugh at him. He often listened to the woman who spoke to him, but Yi did not mention what kind of words about. Oh, this is also one of the abominable sections of women: Iraqi must pretend to be "false".

On this day, Aqi took a day in the house of Taiye Zhao. After dinner, he sat in the kitchen to dribble.If you have dinner, you can go back after dinner, but Zhao House has dinner in the morning. Although the lamp is not allowed to be the light, it will go to bed when you eat it.You can read the articles at the light; the second is that when Aqi came to be a short worker, he was allowed to light the light.Because of this exception, before Ah, she was sitting in the kitchen to smoke and drought in the kitchen.
Wu Ma is the only maid in the house of Taiye Zhao. After washing the dishes, he sat down on the bench, and he was leisurely with Ah:
"My wife didn't eat for two days, because the master wanted to buy a small ..."
"Woman ... Wu Ma ... this little lonely ..." Ah thought.
"Our young grandma is going to have children in August ..."
"Woman ..." Ah thought.
Aqi put down the cigarette pipe and stood up.
"Our young grandma ..." Wu Ma said.
"I and you are sleepy, I and you are sleepy!" Ai suddenly grabbed up and kneeled down to Yi.
It was very silent for a moment.
"Ah!" Wu Ma shook, trembled, shouted and ran out, running and shouting, and seemed to cry later.

Aqi was kneeling on the wall, so he held the empty bench with both hands and slowly stood up, as if it felt a little bad.At this time, he was really a little embarrassed. He panicked and inserted the cigarette pipe on his pants, and wanted to go to the rice.With a crowned, his head was thick, and he hurried back and turned around, and then the show stood in front of him with a big bamboo bar.
"You're reversed, ... you ..."
The big bamboo bar split him again.Aqi hugs his head in both hands, and the shooting is hitting the knuckles, which is a bit painful.He rushed out of the kitchen door, as if on his back.
"Forget the eight eggs!" Xiucai scolded him with his official sayings.

Aqi ran into the rice field, standing alone, still felt his fingerache, and remembered "forgetting the eight eggs", because this is not used by the villagers in Weizhuang.Fear, and the impression is particularly deep.But at this time, his "female ..." thought was gone.And after being scolded, it seemed that one thing had been closed, and I felt like there was no hindrance, so I moved to the rice.After a while, he got hot and took a break again.

When he took off his clothes, he heard that he was very lively outside. Aya originally loved to watch the lively, and he went out.Xun Xunxun gradually found in the inner courtyard of Taiye. Although in the dimness, many people can be discerned., Zhao Sichen.
The young grandmother was dragging Wu's mother and walked out of the room, and said:
"Come outside, ... don't hide in your room and think ..."
"Who doesn't know you are serious, ... short -lasting is that you can't find it." Zou Qiyi also said.
Wu Ma just cried, clamped some words, but he didn't hear clearly.

Aqi thought: "Huh, interesting, this little lonely didn't know what the gadget was?" He wanted to inquire, approaching Zhao Sichen's side.At this time he suddenly saw Uncle Zhao running towards him, and he squeezed a big bamboo bar in his hand.When he saw this big bamboo bar, he suddenly realized that he had been beaten, which seemed to be a bit related to this excitement.He turned around and walked away, trying to escape back to the rice field, not trying to obstruct his way, so he turned around and walked out of the back door naturally.

Aqi sat for a while, and his skin was a little bit millet. He felt cold, because although it was in spring, it was quite cold at night and should not be shirtless.He also remembers the cloth shirt to stay in the Zhao family, but if he takes it, he is afraid of showing the talented bamboo bar.But the land protection came in.
"Ah, your mother! You even teased by the Zhao family's employers, it is rebellion. It hurts me to sleep at night, your mother's! ..."

If Yunyun's lesson was taught, Aqi naturally had nothing to say.At the end of the time, because in the evening, it should be sent to the land to pay more than four hundred wines. Aq is not available for money, so he uses a felt hat to be mortgaged, and five conditions are set:

Tomorrow with red candles -a pound of weight -a pair, a fragrant one, go to Zhao Mansion to compensate. On the second Zhao Mansion, the Taoist priest was asked to remove the ghosts, and the cost was borne by Aq. Three Aya has never been allowed to step into the threshold of Zhao Mansion. If the four Wu moms have followed up, I asked. Five Aya is not allowed to obtain wages and cloth shirts.

Aqi naturally agreed, but unfortunately there was no money.Fortunately, in the spring, the quilt can be useless, and it has 2,000 money and fulfills the treaty.After shirtless, there were a few articles left, and he no longer redeemed a felt hat, and he drank all of them.But the Zhao family did not burn incense candle, because the wife could use it when worshiping the Buddha, and kept it.The broken cloth shirt was mostly the lining of the children born in August in August, and the half -tattered sole was made.
